name: Dead Combat: Zombie Games 3D
description:
Play as various 3D Characters fighting merciless Zombies using both bare hands and multiple weapons. Collect power-ups to unlock amazing powerful combos in this one-of-a-kind Action-packed Fighting Game.  

Experience easy to grasp fighting gameplay. 

Kick, Punch, Attack vicious enemies till the area is safe of zombies in order to progress to the next level.

Game Features:

- Different character skins and skills.

- Battles with heroes with unique abilities.

- Easy and addictive dynamic gameplay for everyone.

Dead Combat: Zombie Games 3D is a fun and addictive experience for 3D fighting game lovers.
